thread.title: Making maps for Doom 3 with Hammer?

post.author: Oilfan
post.body: Is it possible to make maps for Doom 3 with the Hammer from Source SDK ?

post.author: Oilfan
post.body: Okay, so what is the best editor to make maps for Doom 3 then?

post.author: The Happy Friar
post.body:
Doom3Edit, GTK Radient/DarkRAdient.

I prefer Doom3Edit myself, but GTKRadient & DarkRAdient each have their own plusses/minuses. Dark has a built in particle (and others) editor for example (you could still use D3's though) but GTK has a nicer mouse interface imho.

post.author: Oilfan
post.body: Ok thanks for the help!
